english: to walk slowly; footprint pointing down

etymology.description: 夊(夊) (sū, 'to walk slowly; footprint pointing down')
etymology.interpretation: The character 夊 is a pictogram representing a footprint pointing down, symbolizing a slow walking motion. This evokes the idea of a deliberate and careful approach, as indicated by the downward direction of the footprint.

examples.chinese: 古代汉字有夊字的形态。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài hànzì yǒu 夊 zì de xíngtài。
examples.english: Ancient Chinese characters have the form of the character 夊.

examples.chinese: 这个字在现代汉语中不常用。
examples.pinyin: Zhège zì zài xiàndài hànyǔ zhōng bù cháng yòng。
examples.english: This character is not commonly used in modern Chinese.
